page.title: 14RELIGION-LUMLEY CHURCHES.
page.content: Our survey on 34% of villagers showed that 19.38% went to church/chapel once a month or more, 34.15% on occasion, & 46.47% not at all. {The incumbent at {Christchurch is Rev.L.Barron. The West {End and Bethel Chapels will amalgamate {in Sept. as Lumley Methodist Church, under the leadership of the {Rev.J. {Allison,}eventually in a new building. The{GOSPEL HALL chapel, }Scorer's Lane is led by Pastor J.Spooner.{J.Chapman. {CHRISTCHURCH SUNDAY SCHOOL.}Our Sunday morning meeting begins with prayers & hymns after which we do group work. We read the Bible and work on pamphlets, sometimes continued at home. {H.Smith. {WEST END SUNDAY SCHOOL.} We first have a sing-song then we go to our classes. Our activities include Bible reading & quizzes.{L.Vine. BETHEL SUNDAY SCH.}As well as singing and saying prayers, we practise anniversary "pieces".{F.Moore
